    Class
    Description
    Axis
    one-dimensional coordinate axis description.
    Axis.AxisBuilder
    A builder class for Axis, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Coord2D
    a two-dimensional (pair) of reference coordinates.
    Coord2D.Coord2DBuilder
    A builder class for Coord2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordAxis1D
    a one-dimensional coordinate axis: quantity, values, errors; it is usually only necessary to specify one of the range, bounds, or function as they describe the world and pixel coordinate coverage at different levels of detail and the less detailed description is redundant (exception: when the range or bounds and function are both specified, the range/bounds is a subset of the pixels described by the function and denotes the valid pixels.
    CoordAxis1D.CoordAxis1DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordAxis1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordAxis2D
    a two-dimensional coordinate axis pair: quantity, values, errors; it is usually only necessary to specify one of the range, bounds, or function as they describe the world and pixel coordinate coverage at different levels of detail and the less detailed description is redundant (exception: when the range or bounds and function are both specified, the range/bounds is a subset of the pixels described by the function and denotes the valid pixels.
    CoordAxis2D.CoordAxis2DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordAxis2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordBounds1D
    a one-dimensional sequence of reference coordinate ranges.
    CoordBounds1D.CoordBounds1DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordBounds1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordBounds2D
    a two-dimensional region in pixel and world coordinates; this can be used to specify a simple polygon boundary in pixel and world coordinates.
    CoordBounds2D.CoordBounds2DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordBounds2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordError
    coordinate error from FITS WCS.
    CoordError.CoordErrorBuilder
    A builder class for CoordError, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordFunction1D
    a one-dimensional (linear) WCS coordinate transformation function.
    CoordFunction1D.CoordFunction1DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordFunction1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordFunction2D
    a two-dimensional (linear) WCS coordinate transformation function; this can be used to compute the world coordinates of every pixel.
    CoordFunction2D.CoordFunction2DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordFunction2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordRange1D
    a one-dimensional range of reference coordinates.
    CoordRange1D.CoordRange1DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordRange1D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CoordRange2D
    a two-dimensional range of reference coordinates; this can be used to specify an axis-aligned bounding box in pixel and world coordinates.
    CoordRange2D.CoordRange2DBuilder
    A builder class for CoordRange2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    CustomWCS
    one-dimensional pixel and world coordinates describing a non-standard (custom) coordinate axis.
    CustomWCS.CustomWCSBuilder
    A builder class for CustomWCS, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    Dimension2D
    dimension (number of pixels) for a two-dimensional axis.
    Dimension2D.Dimension2DBuilder
    A builder class for Dimension2D, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.

    ObservableAxis.ObservableAxisBuilder
    A builder class for ObservableAxis, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    PolarizationWCS
    one-dimensional pixel and world coordinates describing the polarization states.
    PolarizationWCS.PolarizationWCSBuilder
    A builder class for PolarizationWCS, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.
    RefCoord

    RefCoord.RefCoordBuilder
    A builder class for RefCoord, mainly for use in the functional builder pattern.

    Slice.SliceBuilder
